Name: White Iron Gauntlets
Description: Sturdy gauntlets forged from white iron, fit for any warrior.

Name: Frostbitten Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets that have been imbued with the power of the frost, providing additional defense.

Name: Ivory Knight Gauntlets
Description: Exquisite gauntlets made from ivory, worn by the knights of old.

Name: Radiant Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets that emit a radiant aura, providing additional magic defense to the wearer.

Name: Ivory Gauntlets
Description: Elegant vambraces with intricate carvings that reflect the light beautifully.

Name: Luminous Bracers
Description: Glistening vambraces that seem to radiate with protective magic.

Name: Silken Armguards
Description: Soft and lightweight vambraces that provide a comfortable fit.

Name: White Winged Gauntlets
Description: Soft and supple, these gloves are crafted from the finest lambskin and imbued with the power of flight.

Name: Ivory Handguards
Description: These gloves are made from the hide of a rare albino crocodile, granting the wearer added protection.

Name: Snowdrift Mittens
Description: These gloves are woven from the finest wool, and imbued with a chill that can freeze the most heated of battles.

Name: Frostbitten Handwraps
Description: These gloves are enchanted with the power of winter, providing protection against the most powerful of spells.

Name: Silk Gloves
Description: These gloves are made from the finest silk, providing comfort and style to the most discerning of wearers.

Name: Alabaster Mitts
Description: These gloves are crafted from the purest of white marble, providing a unique and elegant look to any outfit.

Name: Guardian Bracers
Description: These gloves are imbued with the protective power of the most powerful guardians, providing added endurance to the wearer.

Name: Luminous Mitts
Description: These gloves glow with a powerful light, enhancing the wearer's magical abilities.

Name: Diamond Gauntlets
Description: These gloves are encrusted with diamonds, providing the wearer with added strength in battle.
